title: Courses
createSubtitle: Set up a new course for your students
createDescription: Provide basic information about your course. You can add assignment areas later.
descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the course content and important information for students...
name: Course Name

area.createSubtitle: Add a new assignment area to {{courseName}}
area.detailsDescription: Create a new assignment area where students can submit their work for grading.
area.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide details about what students need to submit...

validation.alreadyEnrolled: You are already enrolled in this course
validation.notEnrolled: You are not enrolled in this course

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this course? This action cannot be undone.
messages.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this course?

edit.title: Edit Course
edit.description: Modify the course name and description

setting.title: Course Settings
setting.deleteWarning: Deleting this course will remove all data associated with it.

pageHeader.title: My Courses
pageHeader.subtitle: Manage your {{count}} course and assignment areas
pageHeader.subtitlePlural: Manage your {{count}} courses and assignment areas

noCoursesJoined: You haven't joined any courses yet

joinCourse.title: Join Course
joinCourse.subtitle: You've been invited to join a course
joinCourse.invalidSubtitle: The invitation code you're trying to use is not valid
joinCourse.contactTeacher: Please contact your teacher to get a new invitation code.
joinCourse.alreadyEnrolledSubtitle: You're already a member of this course
joinCourse.alreadyMember: You're already a member of this course and can access all assignments.
joinCourse.reviewDetails: Review the course details below and click "Join Course" to enroll.
joinCourse.roleNote: You're currently logged in as a {{role}}. Course enrollment is typically for students, but you can still join if needed.

benefits.enrolled: You'll be enrolled in the course
benefits.viewSubmit: You can view and submit assignments
benefits.aiGrading: You'll receive AI-powered grading and feedback
benefits.codeUsed: The invitation code will be marked as used

joinCourse.selectClassPrompt: Please select a class to continue
joinCourse.classSpecificInvitation: This invitation code is for a specific class and will automatically enroll you in that class
joinCourse.noClassesAvailable: This course has no classes yet. Please contact your teacher.

emptyState.title: No Courses Yet
emptyState.description: Get started by joining your first course. Ask your teacher for an invitation code or QR code.

steps.getCode: Get an invitation code from your teacher
steps.scanQR: Scan a QR code if provided

emptyState.noInvitationCodeDescription: Generate an invitation code to allow students to join this course. The code will be valid for 7 days and include a QR code for easy sharing.
emptyState.noAssignmentsDescription: Create assignment areas to organize student submissions and apply rubrics.

noCoursesYet.title: No courses yet
noCoursesYet.description: Create your first course to start organizing assignments and managing students.

noCoursesFound.title: No courses found
noCoursesFound.description: No courses match your search criteria. Try adjusting your search term.

detail.noAssignmentsDescription: This course has not published any assignments yet
detail.noDescription: No course description provided by instructor

classManagement.title: Class Management
classManagement.noClassesDescription: The course needs at least one class section for students to select when joining via invitation code

invitationSection.createClassFirst: Please create at least one class section first, so students can select their preferred time slot when joining via invitation code
invitationSection.noInvitationDescription: After generating an invitation code, students can scan the QR code or enter the code to join the course and select a class

classForm.classNamePlaceholder: e.g., Section 101, Friday PM, Section A
classForm.scheduleRequired: Please select class time (weekday and period)
classForm.capacityDescription: Set maximum number of students. Leave empty for no limit.
classForm.createError: Failed to create class. Please try again.
classForm.updateError: Failed to update class. Please try again.
classForm.dangerZoneDescription: Deleting a class cannot be undone and will remove all student enrollment data for this class
classForm.deleteWarning: Warning: Deleting this class will remove all enrolled student data. This action cannot be undone.
classForm.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this class? This action cannot be undone and will delete all student enrollment data.
classForm.deleteError: Failed to delete class. Please try again.

periodSelector.selectPrompt: Please select weekday and period to set class time
